table.name: civicrm_hrleaveandabsences_work_pattern_attribution
table.comment: Represents the attribution of a work pattern to an employee

field.name: contact_id
field.comment: FK to the Contact representing the employee

field.name: pattern_id
field.comment: FK to the Work Pattern the attributed to an employee

field.name: effective_date
field.comment: The date this attribution will start to be considered active

field.name: effective_end_date
field.comment: The date this attribution will stop being considered active

index.name: unique_attribution_per_effective_date
index.comment: An employee cannot have more than one work pattern
